outputs.output_descr: 1. The management and technical teams functional with  requisite equipment and logistics arranged for the efficient coordination of activities. 2. Training modules based on demand identified. The trainers and resource persons mobilised to ensure a systematic rollout of training programme. 3. Enhancing the number and quality of trained conflict mediators in West Africa to influence reduction in armed violence and conflict. 4. Communication, publicity, outreach and knowledge dissemination

project_descr: Developing the capacity of ECOWAS countries to implement the ECOWAS convention on small arms and light weapons control in the region
